data.subject: Isn`t It Romantic?
data.lyric:

 Music in the night, a dream that can be heard
 Isn't it romantic
 Moving shadows

data.subject: Lover
data.lyric:

 Softly, in my ear you, breathe a flame

data.subject: Mountain Greenery

 Now'

data.subject: I Didn`t Know What Time It Was
data.lyric:
